author: Tan Lee Meng J:
casename: Gurnam Kaur d/o Sardara Singh v Harbhajan Singh s/o Jagraj Singh (alias Harbhajan Singh s/o Jogaraj Singh)
counsel: Suppiah T Paul (Paul Lim and Associates) for plaintiff; Gurdaib Singh (Gurdaib Chong and Partners) for defendant
tags-parsed: Land/Interest in land/Joint tenancy/Plaintiff seeking to sever joint tenancy with defendant and sell property/No contribution by defendant to purchase price of property/Proportion in which net proceeds of sale should be divided
